Verses: 1 dhaaveedhu Malaiyuchchiyilirundhu Satrappuram Nadandhuponapodhu, Idho, Meviposeththin Kaariyakkaaranaagiya Seebaa, Podhigalai Sumakkira Irandu Kazhudhaigalai Ottikkonduvandhu, Avanai Sandhiththaan; Avaigalil Irunooru Appangalum, Vatralaana Nooru Dhraatchappazhakkulaigalum, Vasandhakaalaththup Palanaana Nooru Kulaigalum, Oru Thuruththi Dhraatcharasamum Irundhadhu.

2 raajaa Seebaavaippaarththu: Ivaigal Ennaththirku Endru Kettadharku, Seebaa: Kazhudhaigal Raajaavin Veettaar Erugiradharkum, Appangalum Pazhangalum Vaalibar Pusikkiradharkum, Dhraatcharasam Vanaandharaththil Vidaaiththupponavargal Kudikkiradharkume Endraan.

3 appozhudhu Raajaa: Un Aandavanudaiya Kumaaran Enge Endru Kettadharku, Seebaa Raajaavai Nokki: Erusalemil Irukkiraan; Indru Isravel Veettaar En Thagappanudaiya Raajyaththai En Vasamaaith Thirumbappannuvaargal Endraan Endru Sonnaan.

4 appozhudhu Raajaa Seebaavai Nokki: Meviposeththirku Undaanadhellaam Unnudaiyadhaayitru Endraan. Adharku Seebaa: Raajaavaagiya En Aandavanudaiya Kangalil Enakku Dhayaikidaikkavendum Endru Naan Panindhu Kettukkollugiren Endraan.

5 dhaaveedhuraajaa Pakoorimmattum Vandhapodhu, Idho, Savul Veettu Vamsaththaanaayirukkira Keraavin Kumaaranaagiya Seemeyi Ennum Perulla Oru Manushan Angeyirundhu Purappattu, Dhooshiththukkonde Nadandhuvandhu,
6 sagala Janangalum, Sagala Balasaaligalum, Dhaaveedhin Valadhupuramaagavum Idadhupuramaagavum Nadakkaiyil, Dhaaveedhinmelum, Dhaaveedhuraajaavudaiya Sagala Oozhiyakkaararmelum Karkalai Erindhaan.
7 seemeyi Avanai Dhooshiththu: Raththappiriyane, Peliyaalin Manushane, Tholaindhupo, Tholaindhupo.

8 savulin Sthalaththil Raajaavaana Unmel Karththar Savul Veettaarin Raththappazhiyaith Thirumbappanninaar; Karththar Raajyabaaraththai Un Kumaaranaagiya Apsalomin Kaiyil Oppukkoduththaar; Ippodhum Idho, Un Akkiramaththil Agappattaai: Nee Raththappiriyanaana Manushan Endraan.
9 appozhudhu Seruyaavin Kumaaran Abisaai Raajaavai Nokki: Andha Seththanaai Raajaavaagiya En Aandavanai Dhooshippaanen? Naan Poi Avan Thalaiyai Vaangippodattume Endraan.

10 adharku Raajaa: Seruyaavin Kumaarare, Enakkum Ungalukkum Enna? Avan Ennai Dhooshikkattum; Dhaaveedhai Dhooshikkavendum Endru Karththar Avanukku Sonnaar; Aagaiyaal En Ippadi Seygiraai Endru Ketkaththakkavan Yaar Endraan.

11 pinnum Dhaaveedhu Abisaayaiyum Than Oozhiyakkaarar Ellaaraiyum Paarththu: Idho, En Karppappirappaana En Kumaarane En Praananai Vaangaththedumpodhu, Indha Benyameenan Eththanai Adhigamaai Seyvaan, Avan Dhooshikkattum; Appadi Seyya Karththar Avanukkuk Kattalaiyittirukkiraar.
12 oruvelai Karththar En Sirumaiyaip Paarththu, Indha Naalil Avan Nindhiththa Nindhanaikkup Padhilaaga Enakku Nanmaiyai Sarikkattuvaar Endraan.

13 appadiye Dhaaveedhum Avan Manusharum Vazhiye Nadandhuponaargal; Seemeyiyum Malaiyin Pakkaththile Avanukku Edhiraaga Nadandhu Dhooshiththu, Avanukku Edhiraagak Karkalai Erindhu, Mannaith Thootrikkonde Vandhaan.
14 raajaavum Avanodirundha Sagala Janangalum Vidaaiththavargalaai Thangumidaththile Serndhu, Ilaippaarinaargal.
15 apsalomum Isravel Manusharaagiya Sagala Janangalum Avanodekooda Agiththoppelum Erusalemukku Vandhaargal.
16 arkiyanaagiya Oosaai Ennum Dhaaveedhin Snegidhan Apsalomidaththil Vandhapodhu, Oosaai Apsalomai Nokki: Raajaave Vaazhga, Raajaave Vaazhga Endraan.
17 appozhudhu Apsalom Oosaayaip Paarththu: Un Snegidhanmel Unakku Irukkira Dhayai Idhudhaano? Un Snegidhanode Nee Pogaadheponadhu Enna Endru Kettaan.
18 adharku Oosaai Apsalomai Nokki Appadi Alla, Karththarum Indha Janangalum Isravel Manusharanaivarum Therindhukollugiravaraiye Naan Serndhu Avarode Iruppen.
19 idhuvum Allaamal, Naan Yaaridaththil Sevippen? Avarudaiya Kumaaranidaththil Allavaa? Ummudaiya Thagappanidaththil Eppadi Seviththeno, Appadiye Ummidaththilum Sevippen Endraan.
20 apsalom Agiththoppelaip Paarththu, Naangal Seyyavendiyadhu Innadhendru Aalosanai Sollum Endraan.

21 appozhudhu Agiththoppel Apsalomai Nokki: Veettaikkaakka Ummudaiya Thagappan Pinvaiththa Avarudaiya Marumanaiyaattigalidaththil Pravesiyum, Appozhudhu Ummudaiya Thagappanukku Naatramaaipponeer Enbadhai Isravelar Ellaarum Kelvippattu, Ummodirukkira Ellaarudaiya Kaigalum Palakkum Endraan.
22 appadiye Apsalomukku Upparigaiyinmel Oru Koodaaraththaip Pottaargal: Ange Apsalom Sagala Isravelarin Kangalukku Munbaaga, Than Thagappanudaiya Marumanaiyaattigalidaththil Pravesiththaan.
23 annaatkalil Agiththoppel Sollum Aalosanaiyellaam Dhevanudaiya Vaakkaippola Irundhadhu, Appadiye Agiththoppelin Aalosanaiyellaam Dhaaveedhukkum Irundhadhu, Apsalomukkum Appadiye Irundhadhu.
